page.title: 07NEWNHAM INDUSTRIAL ESTATE
page.content: The industrial area can be split into two areas.One is Kay Close and Wall Park Close.The buildings all looked like big boxes all joined together.The ones in Bell Close and Huxley Close were huge and they looked like proper buildings. There was thirty five businesses on the estate.Eight of them were to do with car repair or customisation.Six companies handled transportion or supply of goods.Twelve businesses were involved in engineering,electronics or tool making.Four companies made replacement windows or doors.There were two large civil engineering companies.There was a TV.rental and a chemical company and a small bakery. The motor repair and replacement window companies serve the local area. The transport companies are close to the A38.
